short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool that adds useful features to Bricklink

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:

Order Details Page:
-Checkbox system to mark off parts as you fulfill an order.
-Optional/togglable highlighting for New parts, Used parts, and Qty higher than 1.
-Makes Qty > 1 bold.
-Adds external link for USPS tracking numbers.
-Makes links open in new tab.

My Collection:
-Added Search bar to search through collection.
-Changes default view to 10,000 entries per page.
